Dispel Magic (Magic3 Abju): R110' d20+1 vs. 11+caster level cancels spell or effect
Hold Monster (Law6 Ench): R110' Target immobile for 1 rd (DC 15 Will neg)
Identify (Magic2 Divi): R60' cone info on magical auras, +10 Spellcraft for 3 rd
Imbue With Spell Ability (Magic4 Evoc): Touched with 2/4/5 HD can cast specified 1st/2x1st/2x1st+2nd level spells

Protection From Spells (Magic8 Abju): +8 spell saves for 10 min
